Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item boasts a unique blend of quality, functionality, and style that truly sets it apart. Given its superior features and craftsmanship, we believe its value far surpasses $150. For a limited time, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $200. This is an opportunity to own a piece that not only serves its purpose brilliantly but also adds a touch of luxury to your life. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
